para_sentences.para_0: At this point, you should be able to answer all of the following questions.
para_sentences.para_1: If you are unsure of any of these answers, take some time to review the course materials. Feel free to post questions into the General Q&A Discussion. Next week's lessons will be easier if you have invested in mastering this week's learning outcomes.
para_sentences.para_2: Check the Explorations and Task List in the Week 1 - Overview to review learning materials and make sure you have completed all required activities for this week.

ul_0: What is meant by running time of an algorithm?
What is the order of growth?
How to define O  Ω  and Θ informally?
How to define O  Ω  and Θ formally?
How to analyse the time complexity of non-recursive algorithms?
How to identify a loop invariant?
How to prove the correctness of a non-recursive algorithm?
How to prove the correctness of a recursive algorithm?

heading_sentences: Review - Asymptotic Notations and Correctness of Algorithms
